thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 12 of 620
thread.title: Rowena

author: Rowena
title: Rowena
text: I wanted to order from the Korean clothing site chuu, but the shipping is all too much. I found out that YesStyle carried their brand, so I bought what I wanted and a lot of other items during their clearance sale! I spent a little over $100 for a pair of jeans, cute ribbon flats, 2 pairs of lace under-shorts for mini skirts and dresses, a super trendy plaid pleated skirt, 3 light and heavyweight knits, and a ladylike A-line dress and jacket set. I honestly can't believe I was able to buy so much for so little, as well as free express shipping, but it's possible through this website! Thank you, YesStyle!
